title: FKA twigs Seduces a “Perfect Stranger” on New Song: Stream
description: The dance pop track is the second preview of her upcoming album, Eusexua, which arrives in January. FKA twigs Seduces a “Perfect Stranger” on New Song: Stream Eddie Fu
author: Eddie Fu
excerpt: FKA twigs has revealed a sultry new song titled "Perfect Stranger" ahead of the January 2025 release of her upcoming album, Eusexua.
text: FKA twigs has unveiled a sultry new song titled “Perfect Stranger” as the latest preview of her upcoming album, Eusexua. Twigs co-produced the dance pop track with a cadre of hitmakers including Stargate, Ojivolta, and Stuart Price, offering another hint at the project’s techno in “spirit” sound. As teased in the title, “Perfect Stranger” sees twigs deciding to “live my life with some mystery.” “I don’t wanna have the anxiety/ Please don’t say so I won’t know,” she sings. “I’d rather know nothing than all the lies/ Just give me the person you are tonight.” “Perfect Stranger” arrives after twigs released the album’s title track last month. Eusexua is set for release on January 24, 2025, but you can pre-order it now on vinyl or CD. In April, twigs revealed she was developing her own “AI twigs” deepfake while giving testimony before the Senate Judiciary Subcommittee on Intellectual Property about the NO FAKES Act, which has picked up bipartisan support after being formally introduced this summer. More recently, twigs starred opposite Bill Skarsgård in the Rupert Sanders-directed remake of The Crow.
html:
FKA twigs has unveiled a sultry new song titled “Perfect Stranger” as the latest preview of her upcoming album, Eusexua.

Twigs co-produced the dance pop track with a cadre of hitmakers including Stargate, Ojivolta, and Stuart Price, offering another hint at the project’s techno in “spirit” sound. As teased in the title, “Perfect Stranger” sees twigs deciding to “live my life with some mystery.”

“I don’t wanna have the anxiety/ Please don’t say so I won’t know,” she sings. “I’d rather know nothing than all the lies/ Just give me the person you are tonight.”

“Perfect Stranger” arrives after twigs released the album’s title track last month. Eusexua is set for release on January 24, 2025, but you can pre-order it now on vinyl or CD.

In April, twigs revealed she was developing her own “AI twigs” deepfake while giving testimony before the Senate Judiciary Subcommittee on Intellectual Property about the NO FAKES Act, which has picked up bipartisan support after being formally introduced this summer.

More recently, twigs starred opposite Bill Skarsgård in the Rupert Sanders-directed remake of The Crow.
